website_summaries.verdict: This phone ring can be universally paired with almost any phone, and is praised for its clever functionality.
pros: Crafted from zinc alloy and stainless steel for no rusting or scratching
2-ring design can fit in almost any air vent to work as a car mount, and also makes for an ultra-steady kickstand
Customers rave over the ultra-sticky adhesive
cons: Depending on the make and build of your car, the device could potentially pull down your air vent when using it as a car mount

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great in car vent
customer_reviews.text: Both of the phone ring holders look great, and I like that they use 3M adhesive instead of another aftermarket adhesive. Both the silver and the darker grey metal ring holders look high-quality, and I love that the phone stays in place in the car vent - my phone didn't wobble at all. I had a question about the ring holder and the seller was lightning fast in their response. The only thing to be mindful of is that the adhesive will stick best to a completely flat surface like plastic or polycarbonate, not fabric or an uneven surface (like pebbled leather).
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop

customer_reviews.title: these rings are the perfect solution for him
customer_reviews.text: I have a son who's left arm has been amputated... these rings are the perfect solution for him. He can hold his phone with ease by putting a finger into the ring allowing him to text and play games without fear of dropping his phone. The added bonus of being able to mount it to the ac vent in the car is great... makes being able to see the GPS function so much easier. I did find it hard at first to mount to my case as it's not smooth, but after a few days of use, it's held pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: I’m very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: For as little as this cost I was kinda of afraid to order this. But I was pleasantly surprised by the quality & durability it is!! I’m impressed so much I’m ordering another set! My only request is that please make them in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Laya

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This changed my life. Phone rings are already great because they work as a stand and as a way to help you not drop your phone. But this also mounts on your AC vent in the car, with no hook or magnet needed. It's great for using the GPS or playing music while driving. Only thing is, after a few months the color of the base discolored a bit. But I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sakeenah

customer_reviews.title: WASTE
customer_reviews.text: ok I thought this product had a genius concept. I love things that are multi functional. But holding my phone by the ring was very uncomfortable and after just a few hours, the swivel on the ring became loose and the phone kept twirling around. Needless to say when I put the ring in my cars vent, every time I made a turn or moved the car, the phone would twist a different direction. What a waste of money ):
customer_reviews.author: Mimicus

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The ring is only good for on your finger. While it will clip on air vent the ring spins in a circle so your phone won’t stay upright. It does not work as a kickstand to lean phone up the ring just collapses. While it does stay onto case and the adhesive is strong the fact that the phone spins around makes it impractical and not useable for what I need or was advertised it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good value - unsure of long durability
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of ring holders I’ve owned. The first was an Aduro. Although it costs a little more it appears to be more sturdy. The base of the other ring holder feels solid and the wire/rims feel sturdy in comparison to this one. This is still a good buy for the price but would expected the ring to eventually not hold on air vents.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar A.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and sturdy. But the 3M sticky does not stay. I can't use these bc they won't stay on. But these are so nice looking that I'm going to gorilla glue it on my phone case so it won't fall off.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaB.

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 1! Comfortable, convenient and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought after I saw my sister in laws. Thought I was only getting 1, but got 2 which was a nice surprise. Unlike other phone holders, love that I can stick this in my cars ac vent as a convenient hands free holder, and helps my hand not cramp up from holding my large phone. I also use to prop up and set my phone on table when streaming or reading a book on my breaks at work.
customer_reviews.author: Launa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this cell phone mount because it hooks right onto the vent and I can easily reach it. It's much more convenient than the ones that go on the dash. I can never reach them. It holds my phone easily and I have a fairly large phone. (Galaxy 7).
customer_reviews.author: Eileen E. Culley

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't drop my phone anymore
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to know where I got this cool thing. works great as a phone stand if you turn your phone horizontally. And it's really saved me from dropping my phone into the water or onto the floor. I have a much safer grip on my phone when I use it now. It tends to fall off of my air conditioning vents in my car but that's not a big deal to me. my husband doesn't want one because he thinks it won't slide in and out of his pocket easily. That could be true. But I tend to keep my phone in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tak

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great grip but beware of the sticky part
customer_reviews.text: Great use for such a ring. I loved the idea of a ring as I have used one on my older phone and so I was glad to learn I could use it as a phone holder. It does the phone hold well and sticks firm in the vent. However, the sticky part will remove without warning. I ended up destroying my 3.5mm jack adapter on my new iPhone x. The sticky part does really hold up. Just make sure to check it once in a while whiles you're holding the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Asare

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great hold, multiple ways to use it, and looks great. Only one quirk, you need to be really sure where you want to install it - it's difficult to adjust it afterwards. I have had mine on my phone for more than a year with no problems. I gave my extra phone-ring to my husband and he is very rough with his phone. It lasted 14 months before one of side parts chipped off. He dropped his phone countless times, and even after one of the parts fell off it still worked and clung to the back of his phone.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a 6 star product.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love everything about this accessory. I have a pretty big phone so haveing the ring is nice when I want to prop it up to watch stuff. It makes it easier to take selfies since I can use the ring to hold it at an easier angle. And it clips in to my car vent easily which is nice for GPS navigation. And I love that it's rotates 360°. The ring is also fairly big so I can use it like I would with a pop socket when holding my phone and browsing with just one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grip & kickstand I've had for my phone
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget solved all my problems! The kickstand is great; the way it clips into my air vent in the car works fantastic...perfect for when using Google maps & the ring is great to loop over your finger when holding the phone. I've had other grips & kickstands, but this combines everything into one convenient, non-bulky holder. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the phone ring holder
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the phone ring holder. It holds my phone securely on my dash vent. I especially like the way it swivels. The adhesive is very strong, so make sure you have it positioned exactly where you want it before attaching.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected, sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.text: This ring is just the thing to keep the cellphone from sliding out of my hand. I also put one on my adjustable bed remote so I can hang it somewhere. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: David W. Cron

customer_reviews.title: Works great in vent to hold phone, not so great as a kickstand
customer_reviews.text: Wife purchased these for her phone. She likes how it fits on car vents for hands free. And the adhesive holds up well when using the ring on fingers. However, the ring is too loose to be used as a kicked stand. It automatically slides down whenever trying to prop phone up.
customer_reviews.author: GMFIRE

customer_reviews.title: Send a second adhesive sticker with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It stayed on great but then when I had to change my case I had to pry it off. However, I put it on my new case and it wouldn’t stick right. I wish I had an additional sticky that came with it so I could put it on my new case.
customer_reviews.author: MommaGin

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very functional design I love how it has multiple uses! Car vent -works great! Phone Stand - works great! Phone Holder - works great! The adhesive is strong so make sure you place it where you want it to stay :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Previously used a “Loopy”. Like this much better. More stable hold, makes a great phone stand, and added bonus of dashboard holder. I like that you can attach to just about any phone case. Great price since it is 2 to a package. Gave one to my daughter. She liked it so much I ordered another set of 2 to give to my other daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Garver

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect! Sticks well to where it is applied
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Sticks well to where it is applied. Holds well to the vent ls of my car and helps relieve the strain on my pinkie. Only issue is I didn't get a black one but that doesnt really matter.
customer_reviews.author: PRman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! I can wear it on a finger and it frees up my hand to do other things! It clips to my car and truck vents! It’s a kickstand!! AND I put my wristlet thru the ring and don’t have to worry about carrying it!!
customer_reviews.author: lcw

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, uncomfortable, pointless
customer_reviews.text: I was so pissed when I got this in the mail it makes it look like those rings separate or maybe I just thought that because I don't understand why you would put two rings and then not allow them to separate having a second ring stuck right to the first ring gives nothing to the product it's ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: sydnie winebarger

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: At first it's pretty tight to move but it quickly becomes too loose to keep the phone from wiggling out of your grip. It's hard to explain but I'm not too impressed with these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but they broke too fast.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but they just don't last very long. They break where the rivet swivel is. I so wish they would fix that flaw. Until then, I'm going to have to find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: RhymeRuffian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: All in one!!! Phone ring, car mount! Instead of separate phone ring, magnet mount on car and metal sheet on my phone, it's all in one!!! Freaking awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shinysandbox

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 6th one of these I've purchased and they've all been great sticks well, clips on vent etc. This last one however unlike the others spins freely and it feels as though it'll break. So far so good but I'm trying to be careful..
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is working out perfectly. It is great as a stand on my work desk. But, being able to attach to the vent in my car has been wonderful, especially for navigation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Durability great for a few weeks won’t last a month
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 weeks the ring holder has loosened its grip and it no longer works as a kick stand and or way to use in your car. Essentially I have a loose ring that’s it. It lasted weeks I am deeply disappointed
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: I really like that I can use this in my car and attach it to the air vent. However, the sticky backing is not very strong and comes off my phone case at least once a day. Not happy at all. Won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Culberson

customer_reviews.title: Broke but still a great product and price for two
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion was so good I had to use my metal pick comb to get it off. I’ve had it on my phone case for a little over 8 months and about 3 ago the 360 rotation became very loose and couldn’t hold a position anymore. Some time later the ring broke too (pictured). However, I all around loved it, still used it even after it broke, and would buy another pack of two.
customer_reviews.author: Kerin Vinson

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged, I had them for several months now and they are very functional. The material is sturdy but soft so fingers do not hurt while holding phone. I would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Go

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive, stays put in vents and cd slot
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sticks to my phone strongly. Worked well in both my vents and the cd slot. My only reason for giving 4 stars instead of 5 is the ring itself is too large in diameter and allows the phone to not be stable when I’m trying to use my phone with one hand. I had a previous ring that was smaller and seemed to work better in that scenario.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent product
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a pack of 2. The first ring I had on became loose after using it for about 2 weeks, and I switched it out with the second one, it’s been on for about 3 weeks now and it’s pretty stable and isn’t showing signs of coming loose. I have on the darker one now and although it’s staying in tact, the color is fading a little. Other than that, I use the mount everyday when I drive and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It can save money on replacing dropped phones.
customer_reviews.text: It makes it easier to hold my phone for extended time when needed. I haven't dropped my phone since I added the ring holder. It has exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Great product but adhesive failed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring hook. It did fall off once so I superglued it. I use it on my finger as well as my car vent. Plus it came with 2 color so when I changed phone covers I had one for each.
customer_reviews.author: A Perry

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This did not hold my Samsung Galaxy 8+ for more than 3 minutes before it fell.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, great quality and very convenient to handle phone more efficiently. Will buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Fer W

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me, fits my vents and stays put. Makes it easier to use the phone’s GPS, which I use every day I go to work to go around traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! It is actually 3 in 1 😊 A ring holder for my phone so I have a better grip, a phone stand while watching videos and it works great on the go when driving! I just slide it on the vent and its held up just fine going over rough areas in the road and over railroad tracks! And you get two! Thank you for a wonderful product 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50% chance of success!
customer_reviews.text: 2 were delivered. I kept one and gave the other to my coworker. Hers lost the firm rotation by mine is still prefect as of today and it’s been approximately 1 month
customer_reviews.author: Danay P.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is such a good idea. However, it will not stay stuck to the back of my phone. It has came off several times and finally came off for the last time today. It is not a permanent stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable in my hand
customer_reviews.text: samsung S8 is slippery. The case it perfect and is pretty too. Ring holder works really well and makes the phone stand up so no glare.
customer_reviews.author: appylady

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 stars because it does not stay on the vent at all, it just slides off. But great for holding the phone and as a phone stand!
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.  That says it all.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week now. Seems to be holding pretty well. It works great as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: H. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Ring keeps popping from base!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for the product, tested it on my car vent and worked fine. Glued it to my phone last night. It is now not even a full 24 hours later and the ring itself is what keeps popping off! No problem with the sticker but it’s a big problem if I was buying this to securely hold my phone and it doesn’t even hold! I guess since I have two I’ll try the other, but not happy about having to pry the sticker off and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lose ring
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first until now the ring is do lose it doesnt even stand up the phone or sit on vent clip of my car without dispositioning downward. I wish it would have held up a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: They work perfect. I love the fact that I can mount it on my car vent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this, works great on car. I imagine it will work on any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Struve

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, but stills needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I received my rings less than a week ago, and it's already to the point where it's spinning around. I love the idea - especially because I was looking for something less bulky than the normal phone holders for my car. I think with some improvement, it would be an awesome little gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Liz G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so so so happy I got this ring. Underrated how you can stick it to your air vent in the car. Also just well made
customer_reviews.author: RRZR

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The adhesive is tough and durable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The adhesive is tough and durable. The design is slim so it still fits in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: kenneyetta jones

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Not for petite fingers. Pinched my fingers where ring cover/insulation ended. Did have great adhesive. Returned
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bought 18 months ago
customer_reviews.text: Been using this a long while already, it's still intact. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Shianne A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. 2 for the price of one.
customer_reviews.author: So4chan8

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Just what a klutz like me needs..love how it fit on vents for hands free
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Falls off phones from time to time.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy rings, but once in a while they fall off the phones. They stick right back on, but I would like it better if they were more secure.
customer_reviews.author: JodiePM

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works good as a clip too but the ring stripped out within the 2nd week to use as a stand. This is the second time my son has stripped one of these out so it could be him.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Makse

customer_reviews.title: Quickly becomes flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The stability of the ring does not hold up after just a few uses. I liked being able to attach this directly to my car vent, however after just a day or two of using, the ring flops around causing the phone to flip and flop with every turn of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stay Stuck
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay stuck. I have to keep resticking it. I have a rubber like phone case and it won't stay on this case
customer_reviews.author: marieawill2

customer_reviews.title: First stay on phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack figuring it was a great deal. Not so much. The first ring didn’t stay on my phone. Ok I did remove it when I changed cases. I put the 2nd on brand new didn’t change cases and within 3 days it fell off and I can’t return them since I don’t know where it fell off. Save ur money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was happy at first but it eventually fell off of my phone. Phones are too heavy so it will not hold your phone on your car ac vent. Price was good but it's not worth buying. Sorry but I give it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca E. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This one is better than the others
customer_reviews.text: Better than the other rings I got before, those broke after a couple months.... This feels sturdier a month later
customer_reviews.author: AngelaF82

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Mine was sturdy for about a week. Now it is all flimsy and can be used as a phone stand if I position it just right and hope that my phone doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird95

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Been using for over a week now... Best phone ring I have ever purchased. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JLS1727

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Very handy little thing for car rides. My kids can hang their phones and watch a video. It did takes some getting used to holding my phone the way you have to with it on there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genius design
customer_reviews.text: If I know this thing exist earlier I wouldn’t buy all those car mount... only cons is it’s pretty thick compare to the regular phone ring
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Jen Lo

customer_reviews.title: Too loose - immediately did not work
customer_reviews.text: The ring is supposed to be tight such that you can mount it to your vent vertically or horizontally...however its 100% loose so it just spins...when mounting to the vent it falls into the horizontal position right away...so you can only see your map in landscape mode.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert Wilbertson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The air vent car phone mount is not as strong as I thought it would be. After a couple of time using the air vent car phone mount it does hold the phone as securely.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Malik

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: This adhesive barely works. Nice ring, if only it actually stuck onto my phone
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Phone ring holders
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love both of these phone holder rings. I have multiple cases and will order again for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy D

customer_reviews.title: Not securely fastened
customer_reviews.text: It would no stay stuck to my phone. It did manage to stick to other items nearby.
customer_reviews.author: bethacorn

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another ring holder again. If I ever need to replace mine I will buy same product. It's very sturdy. I even took it off and put on a new case I got, I was afraid it wasn't going to be as sticky but I was wrong. Worked just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This actually works better than I thought while clipping to my air vents. Be careful if your heat is on because the metal will become very hot! Also, ensure you have the exact placement you want because there's no removing this after it's attached!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose hinge after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The kickstand worked great for a month or so until the hinge started getting looser and looser. After 2 months, it is so loose it only functions as a stand if I perfectly position it and any slight vibration will cause the hinge to collapse and the phone to fall flat. No longer useful.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Shin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to clip my phone on the air vent in the car without having to use a separate adapter. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Durable, good quality, 360 rotation, smooth - all that you could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: shethsa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I walk all of the time and this is great for added security that I won't drop my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nezbo

customer_reviews.title: Nice fingers but not for vents in vehicles. At least not ours.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the car and the fell out of the vents. Wouldn’t stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I use it in my car and it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Morphisclan

customer_reviews.title: It hold phone well.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Love the way you it can stand up so you can watch a video on phone. You can also us it to hold ur phone while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Lanijoy1980

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. After some use, it gets a little loose but still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just go this a week ago and already the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just go this a week ago and already the stickiness was coming off. I had to use the second one already.
customer_reviews.author: Jeahn Paulasa

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: It gets wiggly over time so it won't hold up your phone on a table when you want to watch something
customer_reviews.author: Linda Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t hold steady after prolonged use
customer_reviews.text: I loved it right after getting it. Now that it’s been a coup of months, it’s become loose and the phone will spin round and round without any effort. The angle at which you place it is still sturdy, for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Stickers to the back or the phone tightly, is adjustable, can use in the car. It's super sturdy and steadies phone wherever placed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Ring Holder
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ring holder I’ve had it on my phone for moths it’s still tight I really like that it didn’t become loose great quality I definitely recommend before I went through so many ring holders they would constantly become loose right away very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sticky part doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The sticky part of the ring holder lasted about 2 days. After that it would keep coming off. The only thing I liked about it was the split rings side that allowed me to place it in my car vent for whe I used Google maps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Universal easy grip finger ring stand
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with 360° flexibility. Adhesive is very strong, and item works great on heat vents in vehicle. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Carreau

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This phone ring holder is really sturdy and the adhesive is extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Karmeletta A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Sticks out way to far, the phone does not lay flat. Does not clip in car vent as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Again I’m impressed these held up to more expensive ones I had in the past!! The have been sturdy and dependable so far!! I love the double rings as it makes it easier to just put it in the car!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Not good product the clip only worked properly for about 2 weeks and now it does nothing it won't even hold the phone up and the clip won't stay clip to vent in car. So it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: 4hisglory

customer_reviews.title: Ring gets loose very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The ring holder didn’t last a month before the ring got loose.
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive o. The sticker  is not great.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this, had it on for about 3 weeks then itself off. This is the third type that has fallen off of my phone case.
customer_reviews.author: webert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is sturdy and clips to my vent (07 Escalade). The only thing I did not consider was that I cannot charge my phone on the wireless pad anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The first one was spoiled in 3 months, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Aninda Shome

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last, the phone would turn around all the time! Good holder but not for the vent of the car
customer_reviews.author: claudds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. When I first received it I only got one, but was in contact with their customer service department and they resent two more. I couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin m.

product_meta.title: Phone Ring Holder, NEWVANGA 2 in 1 Universal Car Phone Grip Kickstand Finger Ring Stand & Air Vent Car Phone Mount with Strong Sticky Gel Pad for iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Google Nexus and More (2 Pack)
product_meta.description:
NEWVANGA 2 in 1 Universal Air Vent Car Phone Mount & Finger Ring Holder

Feature: 
360° Rotation & 180° Flip, ultimate flexibility to view your phone from any angle. 
Compact and easy use
2 in 1 design, car phone mount and finger ring phone holder, Multi-functional Use
Simple and lightweight

Package Included: 
2* 2 in1 air vent & finger ring phone holder (Black & Sliver) 

Worry-free Warranty 
We will provide 30 days full refund guarantee and friendly support,We guarantee the strength and durability of all our products. 
Our seller warranty guarantees that your purchase is 100% risk-free. We are committed to 100% satisfaction of our customers. If you find any issue with the product, please feel free to email us. We will fulfill your request promptly, hassle-free.
feature_bullets: 360° Rotation & 180° Flip: The flexible joint and invisible spindle make the ring to rotate smoothly, 360° or 180°, landscape or portrait mode at your disposal, giving you ultimate flexibility to view your phone from any angle.
Universal Compatibility: our car mount is compatible with almost all cellphones and phone case, such as iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Android Smartphones and more.

2 in 1 Design: you can use it as a air vent car phone mount, It also can be used as phone stand to watch TV, grip to hold your phone without dropping when you get things with 2 hands, Multi-functional Use, very usage and convenient for your life.
Ultra Sticky gel Pad: The phone ring stand has ultra sticky gel sticks on your phone solidly to provide protection, to help keep your smartphone in place, regardless of road vibrations or impacts.

Package & After-Sales Service - Come with 2 pack air vent & phone ring holder stand, 30 days full refund guarantee and 7*24 customer service, We are committed to 100% satisfaction of our customers. If you find any issue feel free to email us.
